sentences.sContent: Judicial expertise institution and judicial appraiser should be neutral.
sentences.sContent_eng: Judicial expertise institution and judicial appraiser should be neutral.
sentences.sCn: 司法鉴定机构和司法鉴定人应该中立。

sentences.sContent: An appraiser cannot use an appraisal report made for a client as evidence of professional qualification.
sentences.sContent_eng: An appraiser cannot use an appraisal report made for a client as evidence of professional qualification.
sentences.sCn: 评估人员不能使用为委托人编写的评估报告作为专业资格证明。

synos.tran: [法]鉴定人，[保险]评价人；估价官

words.tran: 评价；估价（尤指估价财产，以便征税）；估计
